18#include "tools.h"
19
20int pvck(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
21{
22 int i;
23
24 /* FIXME: validate cmdline options */
25 /* FIXME: what does the cmdline look like? */
26 /*
27 * Use what's on the cmdline directly, and avoid calling into
28 * some of the other infrastructure functions, so as to avoid
29 * hitting some of the lvmcache behavior, scanning other devices,
30 * etc.
31 */
32 for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
33 /* FIXME: warning and/or check if in use? */
34 log_verbose("Scanning %s", argv[i]);
35
36 pv_analyze(cmd, argv[i],
37 arg_uint64_value(cmd, labelsector_ARG,
38 UINT64_C(0)));
39 }
40
41 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
42}
43
